    • Method Detail

      • eval

        public void eval(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix realOutcomes,
        org.jblas.DoubleMatrix guesses)
        Collects statistics on the real outcomes vs the guesses. This is for logistic outcome matrices such that the Note that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the two passed in matrices aren't the same length.
        Parameters:
        realOutcomes - the real outcomes (usually binary)
        guesses - the guesses (usually a probability vector)

      • f1

        public double f1()
        TP: true positive FP: False Positive FN: False Negative F1 score: 2 * TP / (2TP + FP + FN)
        Returns:
        the f1 score or harmonic mean based on current guesses
